p: The percentage composition of the essential oils was computed from GC peak areas without correction factors. Qualitative analysis was based on comparison of retention indexes on both columns, co-injection of some reference terpenoids (α-, β-pinenes, sabinene, myrcene, p-cymene, α-terpinene, thymol, neryl + geranyl acetate, β-caryophyllene, α-humulene, caryophyllene oxide) and C 8-C 28 n-alkane series; and mass spectra with corresponding data in the literature [ 57] and computer mass spectra libraries (Wiley and NBS 54K). Identification has been approved when computer matching with the mass spectral libraries was with probabilities above 90%.
